descriptions.en: Despite the protest of the former King, Seorin convinces herself that she is fulfilling a dream that could not be filled by the former King or her father. Back at the Capital, Park Kyu and William are being charged with treason. Beojin finds herself kneeling before the King asking for the life of William and Par Kyu...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Through a meeting with Yann, Park Kyu finds out that the East India Company is negotiating a deal with Seorin Merchants. Yann on the other hand tells Seorin that there is no more time left for the payments, but Seorin brings out her own secret weapon. William finds out the truth behind Yann's motives.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Through a meeting with Yann, Park Kyu finds out that the East India Company is negotiating a deal with Seorin Merchants. Yann on the other hand tells Seorin that there is no more time left for the payments, but Seorin brings out her own secret weapon. William finds out the truth behind Yann's motives.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin confides in William regarding the secret storage room. Afraid for their lives, William tells Beojin to keep quiet, especially about him still being alive. Upon a coincidental meeting with Park Kyu, Beojin tells him about the secret storage, but Seorin is one step ahead and has it cleaned up when...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Though Park Kyu believes William to be dead, he's actually sold as  a slave to Seorin. Incidentally, he's in such bad condition that it's Beojin that comes to take care of him. On the other hand, Park Kyu is beginning to gather more information regarding Seorin and her background.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: The close of Park Kyu's mother convinces her that Beojin is after Park Kyu. In order to protect Beojin, Park Kyu promises to marry   the Prime Minister's daughter. In exchange for the marriage, Park Kyu requests that the Prime Minster use his influence to bring Beojin's family from Jeju to the Capital.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Coincidentally, Boejin and William run into one another, and are finally once again reunited. But not too long after, William is challenged by the King. Due to his inability to create weapons, William must instead amuse the King in any way possible if he wants to live. The task isn't easy, but with William's life on the line he's unwilling to give up.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin eventually finds herself living at the house of Park Kyu's family, though her identity is all but a lie. All the while Seorin uses her money and power to convince those around her to open up the Josun ports to foreigners. It isn't unfolding easily, but Seorin doesn't let anything stop her as she does whatever it takes to get her way.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin, Yann, and William head out, leaving Park Kyu behind. While gathering supplies out in the market, Beojin finds out Seorin's men are looking for Park Kyu. She runs off to warn him, leaving behind William, but instead of saving Park Kyu, William is captured by the guards and taken back to the Capital.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: While traveling Park Kyu's caravan is ambushed by Seorin's men and Park Kyu is injured. William safely finds shelter with a potter as they hideout from their attackers. Yann and Beojin join hands in order to search for William, despite Yann's protests.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: It's time for Park Kyu to head back, but not without one more plea from Yann. Yann asks Park Kyu to release William, in which Park Kyu explains that it was William's choice not to leave without Beojin. Beojin promises to come find William in the Capital as they separate when...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Yann signs a contract with the village priest for weapons in exchange for a safe passage to Nagasaki for both Yann and William. Beojin and William are being held  by the priest, due to their knowledge of his true nature. The priest is ready to make his move now that he knows of Park Kyu's true identity. A battle begins as Park Kyu and Yann try to save William and Beojin when...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Officer Kim comes upon Park Kyu, Beojin, and William. He promises to punish all of them, when Park Kyu reveals his true identity as the investigator. Both Officer and Park Kyu begin to share information in order to find the real criminals.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin finally gets to see William, who is being housed by the priest. The priest has caught on that Beojin was the one that was hiding William. All the while Park Kyu believes Officer Kim has arrested the wrong people and there are more powerful beings behind the plot when...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin's family and Park Kyu are fenced in by Officer Kim for suspicious activities by Park Kyu. Park Kyu has found a way to escape out of Tamra, and William asks Beojin to come along. Finally making the hard decision, Beojin sets out for the boat when she finds it's been raided...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Believing William is the cause of Beojin's drowning, Park Kyu forbids forbids him from seeing Beojin. Confused at how the villagers treat him, William is once again told by Yann to forget Beojin and prepare to get away from Tamra. Yann is scheming to come up with a way to get to Nagasaki, while the merchants continue to steal offerings.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin is unwilling to open her mouth regarding who was living in the cave and Officer Kim will not rest until she gives him an answer. Park Kyu is in search of a way to help Beojin, when Bokman confesses the items being used again Beojin are actually his. Beojin is finally released when...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin and William successfully gather enough abalone, and Wonbin is finally released. Suspicions arise that Beojin didn't gather the abalone alone, in which Park Kyu states that he helped Beojin. Park Kyu finally finds himself being accepted by the villagers as he continues to investiage the strange disappearances throughout the village.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.ko: Park Kyu still has a hard time adjusting to country life, while Beojin is busy taking care of William. William finds himself beginning to learn the language and is slowly but obviously falling for Beojin. Eventually, Beojin's secret is discovered by Park Kyu who threatens to report the foreigners to the magistrate when...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Beojin can't help but feel tired and worn out by the constant need to live up to her mother's expectations. Unlike all the other girls she's uninterested in diving, and if anything, hates it. Though William doesn't understand, she makes him promise to take her with him when it's time for him to leave.

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA

descriptions.en: Tamra Island misfit, Beojin is sick and tired of diving and instead goes out in search of seaweed to fill her empty basket. She finds golden seaweed hidden amongst the rocks, when she realizes it's far from gold but instead a blond blue eyed foreigner that's been washed ashore. Beojin hides her blue eyed boy, William, in her secret hideaway when...

titles.ar:
جزيره تاما
بث اصلا فى 16 حلقه فى صيف 2009 وهو اؤائل 2010 اطلق المدير نسجه كامله من 21 حلقه مما يجعلها خطوه تاريجه لذا لنستمتع بجزبره TaMnA
